Producer: Sylvain Proulx, Claude Léger, Jonathan Vanger, Jacques Perrin, Nicolas Elghozi, Valentine Perrin, Gilles de Maistre, Catherine Camborde
Production Co: SODEC, MK2 Mile End, Les Productions Wematin, Canal+, M6, Galatée Films, Ciné+, Mai Juin Productions, StudioCanal, W9, M6 Films
Synopsis: After her grandfather's death, 20-year-old Alma decides to go back to her childhood home -- a little island in the heart of the majestic Canadian forest. Whilst there, she rescues two helpless cubs: a wolf and a lion. They forge an inseparable bond, but their world soon collapses as the forest ranger discovers the animals and takes them away. The two cub brothers must now embark on a treacherous journey across Canada to be reunited with one another and Alma once more.
Title: The Wolf and the Lion
